EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #3 - EMEA - 2015.01.29.Email - Follow Up - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Automate Agile Testing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Automate Agile Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Automate Agile Testing! In the webinar, Tricentis’ Worldwide Director for Presales Consulting, Roman Zednik, and Tricentis’ Senior VP of Worldwide Sales, Michael Eckhoff, presented their best methods for optimizing risk coverage through agile testing. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-agile-series-3-emea-watch.html>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting Tricentis
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
